index.title: AI Call Center Next Generation | CallBotAi
index.description: Revolutionary contact center automation system powered by artificial intelligence. Handle calls 24/7, increase conversion rates and reduce operator workload with voice bot technology.
index.keywords: AI call center, voice bot, customer support automation, WebRTC, speech recognition, smart search, contact center, artificial intelligence
index.ogDescription: Revolutionary contact center automation system powered by AI. Voice bot, smart search, and 24/7 customer support in one platform.

login.title: Sign In - CallBotAi
login.description: Sign in to your AIAssistant account to access voice bot configuration, analytics, and call center management tools.
login.keywords: login, sign in, AIAssistant, voice bot, call center dashboard
login.ogDescription: Access your AI call center dashboard and configure voice bot settings.

register.title: Create Account - CallBotAi
register.description: Join the tech revolution! Create your AIAssistant account and start building AI agents for your business cases. Free testing available.
register.keywords: register, create account, AI agent, voice bot, call center automation, free trial
register.ogDescription: Build and test AI agents on your business cases for free. Join innovative companies using AI for business transformation.

dashboard.title: Dashboard - AIAssistant
dashboard.description: AIAssistant dashboard with call statistics, domain management, and voice bot configuration. Monitor your AI call center performance.
dashboard.keywords: dashboard, analytics, call statistics, voice bot management, AI call center
dashboard.ogDescription: Monitor and manage your AI call center with detailed analytics and configuration tools.

bot-settings.title: Bot Settings - AIAssistant
bot-settings.description: Configure your AI voice bot settings including voice selection, instructions, and conversation flows for optimal customer experience.
bot-settings.keywords: bot settings, voice configuration, AI settings, call center bot, voice selection
bot-settings.ogDescription: Configure AI voice bot settings for your call center automation.

visual-editor.title: Visual Scenario Editor - AIAssistant
visual-editor.description: Create and edit call center scenarios with visual drag-and-drop editor. Build complex conversation flows without coding.
visual-editor.keywords: visual editor, scenario builder, conversation flow, drag and drop, call center scenarios
visual-editor.ogDescription: Create complex call center scenarios with intuitive visual editor.
